title: Add NgRx support to an application.
description: Adds NgRx support to an application.

project.description: The name of the application to generate the NgRx configuration for.
project.x-prompt: What app would you like to generate a NgRx configuration for?

minimal.description: Only register the root state management setup or also generate a global feature state.

name.description: Name of the NgRx state, such as `products` or `users`. Recommended to use the plural form of the name.

route.description: The route that the Standalone NgRx Providers should be added to.

directory.description: The name of the folder used to contain/group the generated NgRx files.

facade.description: Create a Facade class for the the feature.
facade.x-prompt: Would you like to use a Facade with your NgRx state?

skipImport.description: Generate NgRx feature files without registering the feature in the NgModule.

skipPackageJson.description: Do not update the `package.json` with NgRx dependencies.
